name: The Colors of "Grease" Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the color of Danny's shirt at the dance?
questions.explanation:
Pink.

	The suit that Danny wore had a pink shirt, handkerchief, and socks.

questions.text: What was the color of Frenchie's dress at the dance?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	If you recall Doody said that she looked like "a beautiful blonde pineapple."

questions.text: What color were the waitress' uniforms at Frosty's Palace?
questions.explanation:
Blue/White.

	It seems to make sense that at Frosty's Palace the girls would wear blue and white.  John Travolta's sister Ellen had a small role as a waitress.

questions.text: What color were Sandy's shoes in the ending carnival sequence?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	Who could forget the black skin-tight outfit that she wore along with those red high heels.  Olivia Newton-John had to be sewn into that costume because it was so tight.

questions.text: What were the colors of Rydell High School?
questions.explanation:
Red/White.

	If you will recall the colors are present several times throughout the film, at the bonfire and when Danny wears the red and white letterman's sweater at the carnival scene.

questions.text: What was the color of Danny's car at the drive-in?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	It was an old red car that was covered with lots of drive-in dust.

questions.text: What was the color of Sandy's night gown the night that she spent with Frenchie and the girls?
questions.explanation:
White.

	Sandy had a white night gown and robe.

questions.text: What was the color of the car that Danny raced at Thunder Road?
questions.explanation:
White with silver lightning bolts.

	The name of the car was "Greased Lightning", just like the song.  Danny had to race the car because Kenickie got knocked out by the car door and couldn't drive.

questions.text: What was the name of the spotlight dance that Danny and Cha Cha shared together after they won the dance contest?
questions.explanation:
Blue Moon.

	"Blue Moon" was sung by the band at the dance Johnny Casino and the Gamblers.

questions.text: What color is the scarf that Cha Cha uses to start the race at Thunder Road?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	She had it tied around her neck.  She was wearing yellow capri pants and a baby blue sweater.
